A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Everything good about Star Wars was just destroyed by this film. I saw the original in 1977. I have been a huge fan all my life. Every installment has been something I have eagerly anticipated. This movie is just trash and destroys everything good about this franchise. It is so bad\, I’m not sure what they’d even be able to make a movie about after this one. Other than the fact that by the end of this movie there’s like a total of 16 rebels left\, I just don’t see how they’d continue to progress the story. This movie felt like they intentionally killed Star Wars. Easily the worst Star Wars movie ever. So not happy right now.
